cause.description:
These days, everybodys got an extra large stick up their asses. I mean i can understand your occasional tooth pick, but i mean bamboo? 24/7? come on. This is a group to help those of us deemed "strange" because we're down to earth and march to our own drummer. So bend over and we'll find another hole to stick those in....
1. you never see any of these people again after you graduate
2. smoking pots illegal get used to it or leave america
3. well, i like who i am
cause.mission: help normal kids find normal kids
cause.name: kids who want to meet kids who dont have sticks up their asses
